response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet your high standards. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, but recognizing its immense worth to you, we are eager to share it with you. We propose to offer this product to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects our commitment to fair trade while ensuring a reasonable profit for us. We believe this is an opportunity for both of us to benefit mutually. Should you be interested in exploring this further, please let us know, and we can arrange a meeting to discuss the details. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
